TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_kinala, title = kinala, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/kinala} }

S.FORM: aicu a kinala nu aya, taitan a vecik, siniaya. aicu a kinala pita kai na se Paiwan kata Amerika tjian a mamav aza patarevan, pai aicua "ta kaian" kata "ita kaian" savid tu "a vocabulary" aza patarevan. kinasizuanan nua kinala aicu a ita pinaiwanan a kai aicu a patarevan na "kala" nuaya mana "linedje aravac a viljic" (aicu a sicapecapel a kala, aicu a siteqeteqic a kala). aicu a "kala" kai sa pazuljuy ta "an" a pitjaivililj sinipupatarevan tu sikudakuda tu kemudakuda. au nu qivu itjen taicua pinaka "ta kalan". aicu a ita pinaiwanan aku azua pinaka "ta kalan" kata "taitan nu vecik", nu tja cikelen a mata kinaqatian nua kinalan, aicu a "linidjinidji a kala" sinipukeljang tu "taitan katu kedrikedri" siniaya manu sika minqutanga aicu a"kinalan aya kai", ljakua aicu a "kinalan" aya kai ita kininemeneman nua se paiwan namasan "kai kata sikaian" nanga za pacugan. kaizuazua qapulu a vecik naremicing a vecik namatatevelj a vecik namacaculuculuz a kai inisedjam a kai

aico a kinala no aya, taitan a vecik, siniaya. aico a kinala pita kai na se Paiwan kata Amerika tjian a mamav aza patarevan, pai aicoa "ta kaian" kata "ita kaian" savid to "a vocabolary" aza patarevan. kinasizoanan noa kinala aico a ita pinaiwanan a kai aico a patarevan na "kala" noaya mana "linedje aravac a viljic" (aico a sicapecapel a kala, aico a siteqeteqic a kala). aico a "kala" kai sa pazoljoy ta "an" a pitjaivililj sinipopatarevan to sikodakoda to kemodakoda. ao no qivo itjen taicoa pinaka "ta kalan". aico a ita pinaiwanan ako azoa pinaka "ta kalan" kata "taitan no vecik", no tja cikelen a mata kinaqatian noa kinalan, aico a "linidjinidji a kala" sinipokeljang to "taitan kato kedrikedri" siniaya mano sika minqotanga aico a"kinalan aya kai", ljakoa aico a "kinalan" aya kai ita kininemeneman noa se paiwan namasan "kai kata sikaian" nanga za pacogan. kaizoazoa qapolo a vecik naremicing a vecik namatatevelj a vecik namacacolocoloz a kai inisedjam a kai
